sub_title: Enterprise Presales Solutions Architect at Dell Technologies
summary:
Presales Solutions Architect with diverse and unique experience and exposure, Building a world‑class cross‑functional career that mixes technology with sales and business development in a customer facing environment. Currently helping customers achieving their business objectives by leveraging cutting edge technologies

I have chosen this career path as it's a multi-disciplinary and includes almost all my personal interests ( Technology, Business, Politics, Psychology, and Strategy ) which makes daily job a hobby that I enjoy not  just a routine.

By working/volunteering in 15+ organization I have gained skillsets that helps me achieve my daily goals and also see further than most of my peers and allows me to advance in my career in a very accelerated steps and also gave me the flexibility to effectively communicate with professionals from different backgrounds and gain leadership positions and more responsibilities.

profile_positions.description:
Promoted to a more strategic role after only 10 months of joining Dell EMC in the presales systems engineering organization.

DISCOVER
>>• Understand and document customer's current environment and capture business & technical requirements.
>>• Understand customer business and IT initiatives in both short and long terms.
>>• Identify new opportunities and upsells.
ANALYZE
>>• Analyze technical requirements for performance, capacity, and availability.
>>• Validate with customer.
DESIGN
>>• Translate requirements into applicable Dell EMC solutions .
>>• Solution design and architecture.
DEFEND
>>• Solution review with the customer & address any technical & competitive concerns.
EXPERIENCE
>>• Better customer experience through enhanced customer interaction.
profile_positions.title: Customer Experience Engineer (CXE)

profile_positions.description:
- Full solution design/sizing for DELL Technologies products based on performance and capacity.
- RFP responses.
- Answering technical ad hoc questions about dell technologies products.
- Developing full customer proposals.
- Perform remote product DEMOs to DELL Technologies customers.
- Technical drawing to map the data center layout with new proposed solutions.
- Technical quotation for DELL Technologies products.

- Functionally promoted to Level 2 - Technical Advising within 6 months of joining the team.


Extras:
- Responsible of shadowing and mentoring the new hires within the team till they are ready for deployment.
- EMEA Regional Team Lead || Graduate Networking Program GNP.

profile_positions.description:
- Take part in the IEEEXtreme Micro Volunteering Challenges (i.e. Micro Activities that excite
and motivate you as an IEEEXtreme team Ambassador).
- Reach out to colleges, universities, IEEE Student Branches and IEEE Student and
Professional Members encouraging them to take part in the IEEEXtreme Programming
Competition.
- Assist Student Branches in hosting the IEEEXtreme Programming Competition and also
supporting members not in a Student Branch in finding a suitable venue for participation.
- Host IEEEXtreme seminars, pre-workshops, training programs, and recruitment drives in
universities/colleges.
- Identify and assist students who require support and guidance with information related to
IEEEXtreme.
- Coordinate having multiple teams the teams under one roof and provide needed support
before the event.
- Connect student members who are searching for team members and help teams to find
Proctors (who should be Professional Members).
- Take part in volunteer training webinars and post-webinar activities for increased learning
and beneficial outcomes.
profile_positions.title: IEEEXtreme Egypt Ambassador

profile_positions.description:
Summary of Responsibilities and Duties:
- Leading an IEEE student branch of 45+ engineering students and grads, distributed among
7 different teams; (Marketing, Reporting & Publication, Logistics, PR, HR, Activities, and
Graphics)
- Be always responsible of making sure that the chapter meets the level expected by its
members.
- Balance his duties in the action & management levels.
- Preside at all the chapter’s meetings.
- Follow up daily tasks via the Vice-chair.
- Follow up periodically the committees’ plans.
- Determine with other board members the plan for the upcoming period.
- Discuss issues and problems confronting the chapter with other board members.
- Hold regular meetings for board members, chapter volunteers and committees’ heads.
- Follow up necessary reports for IEEE student services made by the Secretary.
- Encourage board members’ role in strategic planning.
- Formally evaluates the performance of the committees’ heads and informally evaluates
the effectiveness of board members.
- Evaluate the performance of the SSCS AlexSC in achieving its mission.
- Develop the chapter’s activities and perfectly handle the new requirements.
- Take critical decisions which should be in the chapter’s favor.
- Follow up the tasks of other board members to ensure that everything is going on as
planned.
profile_positions.title: Chairman || IEEE SSCS Alexandria SC

profile_positions.description:
- Plan and execute the annual marketing campaigns whether online or onsite campaigns.
- Lead a committee of 7 marketeers.
- Distribute and follow up the tasks among the committee members and coordinate with other
heads.
- Manage the life streaming and the photographers team during the events.
-Coordinate with the other committees head to make sure we achieve our annual plan.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Committee Head || IEEE SSCS Alexandria SC

Mind Utopia is an extensive set of courses presented in few sessions and workshops to increase students mental abilities to achieve better academic level and be more creative than ever, all of this and more is to be presented in new out-of-the box means.

Vision: 
Entrepreneur Youths armored with skills and knowledge. 

Mission: 
Change the youth perspective to themselves and their role in the society.
- A voluntary educational project dedicated to Syrians living in Egypt.

Agency of Volunteerism for Awareness and Development (AVAD) is a social foundation directed by its permanent council, seeks to achieve a real renaissance and awareness for the human communities, through forming voluntary clubs (AVAD Clubs) in each possible city and country in order to execute unique projects and activities as a level of setting a lot of values, ethics and youth empowerment.
https://www.facebook.com/page.AVADClub

In a co-operation with BAA[Business Administration Association] and Indicator.
MCS stimulates the concrete reality of companies through making a small model of companies to decrease the knowledge and applicable gap between the academic studies and the work reality .and destroy the educational routine by using a creative educational tools like workshops and interactive learning.
